_comment_1: Possible values of baseType, are (0, 1, 2) for (MOTION, STATIC, PLANNING). Do not change its value in this file.
_comment_2: For possible values of id, see PlanningModule/PlanningBehaviorIds.h, MotionModule/MotionBehaviorIds.h and GBModule/GeneralBehaviorsIds.h
_comment_3: For possible values of type, see PlanningModule/PlanningBehaviorIds.h, MotionModule/MotionBehaviorIds.h and GBModule/GeneralBehaviorsIds.h
_comment_5: The requested start posture behavior to run. For details, see BehaviorConfigs/include/PBConfigs/PBNavigationConfig.h

startPosture._comment_6: For possible values of requestedPosture, see Utils/PostureState.h

endPosture._comment_6: For possible values of requestedPosture, see Utils/PostureState.h
